Reviews.Title: A little high priced but works excellent.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I waited a bit to write this review because honestly you have to use a product like this for awhile to have a clear picture on how the product works. This is extremely user friendly, I am having no issues with connectivity. I also gave it some thought prior to installing the cameras as to where I would keep the monitor. That is important for all cameras to connect. Due to my household there is only one camera that experiences some outage issues but it is not the camera (I switched it out with one that never does that) it is my location. But it works when I need it too by tweaking the location of the monitor. For my needs this was well worth the money, although I thought it was a little too much.

Reviews.Title: Security Man
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: This product is ok.  I expected it to have intercom, which it does not.  It has audio from the camera to the monitor, but mine is so noisey I have to keep it turned off to be able to stay in the same room with it.  This is my major complaint.  Also, it certainly needs a larger monitor, and the transmiting range is very limited.

Reviews.Title: Great system.
Reviews.Author: Susan J. Roper
Reviews.Content: Daytime viewing is great.  Very high quality.  Nightime is OK but not even close to the daytime quality.  The audio is pretty bad.  The second day of using this security system I was able to tape the neighbor's dog attacking people walking down the street and finally something was done about a bad situation.  That alone made the whole system worth while.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL CAMERA'S
Reviews.Author: Jeri
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, Wonderful night vision, sound,ETC. I never had cameras before and I was worried , But these are AWESOME INDEED! THANK YOU SO MUCH! I will order again.

Reviews.Title: system OK
Reviews.Author: Gary Boyer
Reviews.Content: A good system for the price and easy to install. Power cords for cameras could be longer. I needed extension cords for some.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Kip
Reviews.Content: Pro's: Good recording, Decent picture, Ease of use. Easy to set up, When the electricity goes out and comes back on, the system comes back up by itself (the reason I went with it, over the Lorax).Power cords for the cameras are long.Con's: Horrible, HORRIBLE reception, DVR keeps losing reception with cameras. I have the DVR in the kitchen and it is NO MORE THAN 28' from ANY camera, (vinyl siding, wood stud house). A far cry from the 200' claimed by the Mfg. I emailed Securityman and they replied with what I needed to buy to increase reception. Which I will do, because it's a $440 waste of money at this point.I have been wanting a system for years, but have been reluctant because I didn't want something that was unreliable.... Well, that's exactly what I got. If You are going to put all the cameras inside your home, it will work fine.

Reviews.Title: SecurityMan system
Reviews.Author: Pamela Ellis
Reviews.Content: Had a little difficulty in getting cameras to pair with the monitor, called tech support and problem solved. Good reception on all four cameras. Good quality at a reasonable price, easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Watch the House
Reviews.Author: Wil Daniels
Reviews.Content: My wife wanted a wireless camera so that she could see whats going on outside near her car and this is it.Thank youWillyd & Josiz of Hamilton, New Jersey

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: Richard Lehmberg
Reviews.Content: This is just what I was looking for. We want to see who is coming to the front door and this is the cat's meow. Everything we needed and the ease and simplicity is great.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed at the right price, this sight has everything
Reviews.Author: Julio
Reviews.Content: It was perfect quick and easy to install, fast paste. Even night vision was a bonus. Have to say didnt know It came with it

Reviews.Title: Good Camera System for your Home
Reviews.Author: dsbailey
Reviews.Content: I purchased this earlier this year to monitor new healthcare aides caring for my father, while I was away from the house.  They work very well.

Reviews.Title: Easy set-up and great product
Reviews.Author: Brenda M-Cameron Cty
Reviews.Content: Would definitely recommend this product!  It is extremely easy to set up and use.  Gives eyes where needed to keep track of happenings around our recreation building!  Keeps the kids honest ;)

Reviews.Title: Don,y waste your money!!
Reviews.Author: Mary Harness
Reviews.Content: The cameras only work part time. What good is that? I still have them all in the house and 25 ft. must be to far away. No way would I drill holes in my house to mount this system. Don,t waste your money !!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: not so happy
Reviews.Author: timothy
Reviews.Content: it's super cheap, night vision sucks,super hard to get reception for your cameras unless they're super close together...it just depends on what you are using it for...daylight is great you can see everything but it's missing some adjustments...

Reviews.Title: great system
Reviews.Author: michael kiser
Reviews.Content: product as described great system , also great tech support ,helped me  with all ?s highly recommend plan on futcher purchases
